Deleted

Alice was beginning to get very tired of sitting on her knees by her sister on the grassy bank, and of having nothing to do: once or twice she had peeped into the dusty old book her sister was reading, but it had no pictures or conversations in it, ‘and what is the use of a book,’ thought our little Alice ‘without pictures or conversations?’

Inserted

Alice was beginning to get very tired of sitting by her sister on the bank, and of having nothing to do. O: once or twice she had peeped into the book her sister was reading, but it had no pictures or conversations in it, ‘and what is the use of a book,’ thought Alice? ‘without pictures or conversations?’
